resources.string: (Some callers may disturb you during this time)
CREATE TABLE MissedActivity (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name VARCHAR(50), phone BIGINT(11) NOT NULL, time DATETIME, action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, message VARCHAR(150));
To temporarily Dettach from all \n calls, texts and app notifications
People trying to reach you will be notified \n of your status and time you will \n become available
People with Dettach app may interrupt you.
How long will you be gone
SMS Permission has been granted. Preview can now be opened.
Contacts Permissions have been granted. Contacts screen can now be opened.
Phone state Permissions have been granted. Contacts screen can now be opened.
SMS permission is needed to show the camera preview.
Contacts permissions are needed to demonstrate access.
Phone state permissions are needed to demonstrate access.
